original_text: The Lord will not stop being angry, until he has finished what he has decided to do. When the time comes, you will understand this clearly. The Lord will not stop being angry, until he has finished what he has decided to do. When the time comes, you will understand this clearly. The Lord will not stop being angry, until he has finished what he has decided to do. When the time comes, you will understand this clearly. The Lord will not stop being angry,
korean_text: 여호와의 진노는 그의 마음의 뜻한 바를 행하여 이루기까지는 돌이키지 아니하나니 너희가 끝날에 그것을 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will not stop being angry
until he has finished what he has decided to do

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이것을 분명히 이해하게 될 것이다
